promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute mythical dragon electric-type pokemon holding a yellow and black staff. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or dragon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltserpent, a a chibi cute mythical dragon electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Thunder, Baby-Doll Eyes. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "dragon", "electric" or "Voltserpent". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, dragon-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: The charming creature, Voltserpent, thrives amidst shattering skies. It playfully manipulates lightning and enchants with its endearing gaze.
